text: @realDonaldTrump OMG!! The CURE IS SO OBVIOUS TO ME! I Called the CDC and they couldn't believe it! "Cure" begins with the letter "C"! WHICH IS THE SAME letter USED for Covid-19! The SAME LETTER THATS USED for Coronavirus AND FOR CARROT! PEOPLE NEED TO EAT MORE CARROTS! "CARROTS" BEGINS WITH "C"! https://t.co/13Al8HlClH
